seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching packages designed for relocation, career transitions, and ongoing leadership support across languages.

hero.title: Coaching packages that hold real-life transitions
hero.subtitle: We pace sessions with your capacity, agreements, and consent. Start small or stay longer — you choose.
hero.note: Coaching does not replace therapy, counselling, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice.
hero.primaryCtaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
hero.secondaryCtaAria: Scroll to the starter packages section

packages.title: Packages for different rhythms
packages.subtitle: Each option begins with a consent-led intro call and written agreements.

cards.title: Transition Package — 6 sessions
cards.summary: For relocation to the UK, role or industry changes, or re-entering work after a pause.
for: You are navigating new systems, policies, or expectations in parallel.
You want steady accountability that respects rest, caregiving, and visa timelines.
includes: 6 × 50-minute sessions across 8–12 weeks with midpoint check-ins.
Context mapping to understand your supports, constraints, and priorities.
Light between-session notes or nudges only when you consent to them.
outcomes: A realistic 3–6 month transition plan you can communicate to stakeholders.
Clear agreements on actions, boundaries, and what to revisit later.

cards.title: Grounding Sprint — 3 sessions
cards.summary: For moments of overwhelm, burnout risk, or when a single decision needs clarity.
for: You need a confidential space to slow down before choosing your next step.
You prefer reflection and body-aware grounding instead of quick-fix advice.
includes: 3 × 50-minute sessions over 4–6 weeks focused on one priority.
Simple grounding rituals to try between sessions (opt-in, no homework pressure).
Email check-ins limited to logistics or quick reflections you request.
outcomes: A decision-making map that balances your capacity and commitments.
Renewed language to advocate for the support or boundaries you need.

cards.title: Ongoing Partnership
cards.summary: For ongoing leadership, career, or community work that benefits from regular reflection.
for: You want two coaching sessions each month with space to adapt topics.
You value a thinking partner who understands cross-cultural leadership dynamics.
includes: 2 sessions per month with quarterly reviews to adjust goals and cadence.
Defined async support (voice note or email summaries) agreed in advance.
Optional triad sessions with stakeholders when consented by all parties.
outcomes: Sustained leadership practices that centre wellbeing and clarity.
Shared language for your team or community about priorities and limits.

howItWorks.title: How coaching works here
howItWorks.subtitle: A steady loop that mirrors the home page and keeps you in charge.

steps.title: Intro call
steps.description: 20 minutes to understand context, confirm consent, and decide if coaching is appropriate.

steps.title: Agreement
steps.description: We co-design scope, language, safeguarding, fees, and scheduling before any paid session.

steps.title: Focused sessions
steps.description: You lead the agenda each time while we coach, reflect, and surface experiments that fit your reality.

steps.title: Review & next steps
steps.description: We capture learning, adjust cadence, or close with clarity about other support you may need.

checklist.title: Is this for me?
checklist.subtitle: Signs that SustainSage coaching could be a good fit right now.
items: You prefer reflection and co-design over prescriptive advice.
You are ready to share context about relocation, caregiving, or cross-cultural work.
You want support that respects trauma awareness, consent, and pacing.
You are comfortable experimenting between sessions in ways you choose.
You value bilingual or language-flexible conversations.
You appreciate clear boundaries around time, scope, and communication.

cta.title: Not sure which fits?
cta.body: Book a 20-minute intro call and we will map options together — including signposting other services if coaching isn’t right now.
